name: album_tracks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_data.
Tool description: Spotify Data
API description: Fetches the tracks of a specified album from the Spotify API using RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the album.

offset.description: The starting point for the track list. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of tracks to return. Defaults to 300.
